PlaySTEM

About Us

Established in the UK, PlaySTEM provides outstanding-design and high-quality educational products to help children Play scientifically, Read the learning booklet, and be Inspired.


Our Mission

To design products that bring children fun and arouse their curiosity, our designers from Europe and the US come up with a variety of product concepts involving science, technology, engineering, mathematics, and art.
